column1: I am an engineering student at University of Waterloo
I went to high school in Vancouver
My brother is a high school teacher
My parents used to own a business
I am the only child in my family
I worked at Microsoft around 5 years ago
I'm the oldest in my family
I want to go to Conestoga Mall
I had to go to work at Google this morning
I have been living in Waterloo since I was 5 years old
